title: Spaced repetition systems have gotten better
author: domenicd
aiHeadline: Finally, after years of being the most boring productivity tool, spaced repetition systems have gotten slightly less terrible.

title: Show HN: I modeled the Voynich Manuscript with SBERT to test for structure
author: brig90
aiHeadline: Because the world really needed another attempt to decode the Voynich Manuscript, someone used SBERT to model it and found... well, probably nothing useful.

title: France Becomes First Government to Endorse UN Open Source Principles
author: bzg
aiHeadline: In a shocking move, France endorses open-source principles, proving that even governments can occasionally do something right.

title: Ditching Obsidian and building my own
author: williamsss
aiHeadline: Why use Obsidian when you can build your own note-taking system and spend countless hours debugging? Someone decided to find out.

title: $30 Homebrew Automated Blinds Opener
author: busymom0
aiHeadline: Because manually opening your blinds is just too much work, someone built an automated opener for $30 and now can finally relax... until the next DIY project.
